phrases: Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
The sound resonates Into my heart, so hard and deep
A field of stars spans endlessly
And through it I carve a passageway
In step with time as generations change
Close your eyes and listen closely
Shooting stars stream on silently until the goodbye
Keep the light inside of you, never give up do not ever lose
Transcend time and you will prove, there is a special place for you
A blaze of glory is there,
It is all a part of our estate; life is our story to create
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light Throughout the age, never fade away
A secret fire, a scream of light, voices calling through twilight
Cast your thoughts to the wind, hang your wishes on the moon
Live your life with all your strength for dreams will reach you very soon
Raise your eyes you can see shooting stars up in the night sky
Wishes speak from ages old by voice of light
Throughout the age, never fade away
Someday your dream will find its place somewhere
were fake souls created to battle Hollows.
However, the project was abandoned as inhumane
and the order was given to destroy all of the Mod Souls, but
Well, I guess that is it.
You are angry are not you?
Why are you getting so scared?
We are in this together, are not we?
I will take care of everything.
Shall we go to collect our merchandise then?
What is he doing all by himself?
If I stay calm, I can easily read your moves!
A Hollow is about to appear!
A strange high school student attacked us!
I think you boys play too many video games.
That Soul Reaper and those kids ruined my good mood
It is around where I was
Is it going to attack those kids?
I will make a better one.
Why does not she believe us?
Probably because we are always misbehaving.
And she even confiscated our games.
My Soul Pager is not working right.
You should have bought some spare batteries instead of pining after a Chappie!
I cannot figure out the location of the Hollow.
I-It is that high school student!
You interfere with my meal, then you run all over the place.
I do not know who you are,
but you are not strong enough to be messing with me!
Whose body do you think this is?!
If a two-bit one like this can bloody you up this bad,
do not even think about fighting!
I had to fight it because you took so long getting here!
You are supposed to be a battle-ready Mod Soul!
Once you crack its head, the Hollow will disappear on its own!
Are you boys pulling my leg?
Then, where is this bleeding high school student?
I want you to stay and clean after school again tomorrow, okay?
If I did not help them, they would have been killed.
And I will not let anyone get killed.
the Soul Society ordered all Mod Souls be destroyed.
my date of death was determined the day after I was created.
I trembled in fear every day, inside that pill,
as I watched the others around me disappear, day by day.
Even though I was able to slip out of the warehouse
I was always afraid that I would someday be discovered and destroyed.
Why should others determine my fate?
Why cannot I decide for myself?!
Is not it up to me whether I live or die?!
That is why Iwon't kill anyone
And I do not want to see anyone killed.
Oh, my Here I finally found you and you are all battered up.
Looks like all the equipment we prepared was for nothing.
But I thought I would finally be able to fight it out, after all this time.
What are you going to do with that?
Well, how can I answer that?
Do you take back goods you have sold to people without giving them a refund?
Oh, well, I guess I will refund you then.
I am satisfied with this item.
Besides, you guys work outside the laws of the Soul Society.
You are not really obligated to collect these things, are you?
Do not blame me if you run into trouble.
We are going to be hiding out.
I have gotten used to trouble lately.
Man Abusing my body, knowing it was not his
Hey, I am talking to you!
You must look very strange to outsiders.
Rukia, what do I do to complain to him directly?
Well, you would need to insert it into a body without a soul
in other words, a dead body.
I am not going to find one lying around!
In other words, all I need is a receptacle, right?
Oh, but this body I am in is not a real body either
Please pardon the inconvenience during the construction.
O-Okay, let us give it a try.
You put it into its mouth, I guess
My hands have gotten so cute!
I do not think our discussion was over!
I am going to take real good care of you!
Then I guess I will take you on as I am!
If you give up, then wake up and apologize!
If you do not, I will get in your school bag and follow you to school.
The girls in your class will say,
Oh, Kurosaki you carry a stuffed animal around?
Yammering away first thing in the morning
I told you to shut up and act like a stuffed animal, did not I, Kon?!
Why the heck are you calling me Kon?!
It is hard to call you Kaizo Konpaku.
That is no reason for you to call me Kon!
Does not it sound sort of silly?
Why do not you call me Kai, instead?
I like Kai. Call me Kai.
Because Kai sounds kind of cool.
What is all this racket, so early in the morning?
I cannot even take my time changing clothes
N-Nice angle I am glad I am a stuffed animal
What are you doing, so early in the morning?
Kojima and Asano are waiting for you.
I am going to be late!
Your toast is ready, so eat before you go.
I will be right out, so wait for me!
Well, take your time, but hurry, okay?
You erased the memories of my classmates again, did not you?
You would not want them to remember what happened yesterday, would you?
Too many things have been happening.
Ichigo, I am going on ahead.
Say, Tatsuki, your elective was art, right?
Did you do your assignment, Me in the Future?
Let us show each other what we have done.
I have no confidence at all.
I am going to be the female vale tudo champion someday!
Mine is too awful to show you.
Actually, in my heart, I call it my masterpiece!
The Future Me  Maximum speed: 380 kph!
From my mouth, flames of 20,000 degrees Celsius,
and from my eyes, special destructive rays!
That is definitely not what you were supposed to draw!
Do you want to get detention again?
He is sure in a good mood today.
Michiru, what is the date today?
He is not in a good mood.
He acts like that when he is really tense.
Do not worry I know the reason why.
Tomorrow, he is going to skip school.
Kurasaki Clinic will be closed tomorrow on the 17th.
I would like to  discuss our duties for tomorrow!
I am the chairman, I get to make all of the decisions!
You cannot call this a discussion!
Raise your hand if you want to speak, Chief of Staff!
Yuzu will be the lunch staff officer, as usual.
What happened to Chief of Staff?
Oh, I just had my hair cut.
What do you think of it?
The family meeting you had, of course.
Are you playing hooky from school and going on a picnic tomorrow?
About my job as Soul Reaper
Can I take the day off tomorrow?
What is going on with you?!
You have been acting strange since this morning.
It is the day she died
Tomorrow's the anniversary of the day my mom died.
To be precise, it is not the day she died
it is the day she was killed.
Tomorrow, he is going to skip school.
If If I were the rain
would I be able to connect with someone is heart,
the way the rain connects the never-intersecting sky and earth?
I will not lose this time!
And what has that young lady done?
She has stayed too long in the human world.
We would not call you out if that were all
I can be a little rough, I take it?
Though the voyage must continue on
When the cycle of the moon has renewed may it shine
It is light to guide your boat
I offer this voyage a prayer
With each new day that still awaits
To the end of the journey
The Isshin Kurosaki Serial Murder Case -
The Madness over a Huge Serving of Pot Stickers and
The Sweat of a Sorrowful Father
Sealed in a Bean Jam Ricecake by a Beautiful Nurse!
There will even be some wardrobe malfunctions!
